  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room()
      Default constructor for creating a Room object.

    • Room

      public Room(int ID, int numBeds, Room.BedType bedType, Room.Quality quality, boolean isSmoking)
      Parameterized constructor for creating a Room object with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      ID - The room number.
      numBeds - The number of beds in the room.
      bedType - The type of bed in the room (TWIN, FULL, QUEEN, KING).
      quality - The quality level of the room (ECONOMY, COMFORT, BUSINESS, EXECUTIVE).
      isSmoking - True if the room is smoking, false otherwise.

  • Method Details

    • printRoomInfo

      public void printRoomInfo()
      Prints information about the room including room number, number of beds, bed type, quality, and smoking status.

    • getMaximumDailyRate

      public double getMaximumDailyRate()
      Calculates and returns the maximum daily rate for the room based on its quality, number of beds, and a base rate for each quality level.
      Returns:
      The maximum daily rate for the room.

    • getTotalCost

      public double getTotalCost(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Calculates and returns the total cost for staying in the room between the specified start and end dates.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the stay.
      endDate - The end date of the stay.
      Returns:
      The total cost for the stay in the room.

    • numBedsFactor

      public double numBedsFactor()
      Calculates and returns a factor based on the number of beds in the room.
      Returns:
      The factor based on the number of beds.

    • getRoom

      public static Room getRoom(String cruiseName, int id)
      Retrieves a Room object from the database based on the provided cruise name and room ID.
      Parameters:
      cruiseName - The name of the cruise.
      id - The ID of the room.
      Returns:
      A Room object retrieved from the database or null if not found.

    • getQuality

      public Room.Quality getQuality()
      Retrieves the quality level of the room.
      Returns:
      The quality level of the room (ECONOMY, COMFORT, BUSINESS, EXECUTIVE).

    • setQuality

      public void setQuality(Room.Quality quality)
      Sets the quality level of the room.
      Parameters:
      quality - The new quality level to set for the room.

    • getBedType

      public Room.BedType getBedType()
      Retrieves the type of bed in the room.
      Returns:
      The type of bed in the room (TWIN, FULL, QUEEN, KING).

    • setBedType

      public void setBedType(Room.BedType bedType)
      Sets the type of bed in the room.
      Parameters:
      bedType - The new bed type to set for the room (TWIN, FULL, QUEEN, KING).

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Retrieves the room number.
      Returns:
      The room number.

    • setID

      public void setID(int ID)
      Sets the room number.
      Parameters:
      ID - The new room number to set.

    • isSmoking

      public boolean isSmoking()
      Checks if the room is designated as a smoking room.
      Returns:
      True if the room is smoking, false otherwise.

    • setSmoking

      public void setSmoking(boolean smoking)
      Sets the smoking status of the room.
      Parameters:
      smoking - True to set the room as smoking, false for non-smoking.

    • getNumBeds

      public int getNumBeds()
      Retrieves the number of beds in the room.
      Returns:
      The number of beds in the room.
